暴雪你妈死了

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊🙌，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带👍，拆开一包✋😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎👍✋，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完👍👍，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?👆👆右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋
游戏还是那个游戏，而我不再是那个懵懂无知的少年。从小时候接触的第一款游戏是星际争霸1.08开始，就与暴雪结下了十余年的孽缘。为了发这篇牢骚，我重下了这款游戏（为了这瓶醋包了个饺子），暴雪生而伟大，死的活该，这便是我的离书
i love this game

Don't listen to the negative people (mostly.) While yes, since the launch of Overwatch 2, it is no secret that the monetization system is atrocious, the game itself is still top tier if not better than the original. I think 5v5 is a much better experience and each character i unique. Combined, both Overwatch games are my most played game ever at around 950+ hours on my blizzard profile. Hopefully one day they will fix the money side of the game, but the game itself is some of the best game play it's been.

“我们讨论过很多次了，你没必要再做下去。”一个声音从一座破旧的古堡中传出，“温斯顿的消息不是发给你的，这不再是你的战斗。爸爸告诉我，你为守望先锋效力那么多年，你把一切都献给了他们，最后却被赶了出来，为什么还要回去，为什么还要战斗！”说话的是一位不过三十岁的女性，可从她健壮的肌肉上可以看出，她绝不是尔等之辈。此时她正在尽力劝说一位老者，而老者却不为所动，仿佛他的心早已定在了曾经的战场。
  “老头，你决定了，真的要离开我们？”同样的地点一位同样健硕的年轻人同样在询问一位老人，看了看老者递来的标着，扔了回去，他的模样似曾相识。
  “我受到了召唤，必须回应，这是伟大的荣誉！”老者一把接住了飞来的标志，并严肃的回答道。
  “昂——为了加入那个什么神秘组织扔下兄弟？放弃加入十字军的荣耀？哈哈哈哈，这算什么荣誉。”前者一脸不屑，拿起手边的战刀，狠狠的在桌子上留下了一道长长的印记。
  “哈，他是希望自己能被选上，”旁边的战士悄悄的对朋友说，听到的不仅仅是朋友还有那位年轻人。说完刚想抓起面前的酒杯解解渴却被年轻人抢过一口喝掉，虽然他看上去经常损老者，不过长时间积累的感情是毋庸置疑的。
  “十字军战士可是保家卫国的伟大英雄，我们会向歌曲里歌颂的那样，永垂不朽！”年轻人斗志昂扬，越说越激动，可老者的话却像一桶冷水，浇灭了他的热情。
  “永垂不朽的是我们的事业，而这场战争，比我们任何人都重要。”话音刚落，突然冲进来一位士兵：“鲍里德上校，东边有空投舱 ，他们来了！”
  “好了伙计们！给我们唱歌的来了！带上你漂亮的舞伴，杂碎那些铁罐头！”
  “别忘了你的拐棍，老头！”年轻人说着，递给他一把沉重的铁锤。
  “哈哈哈哈！为荣誉而生！”
  “为荣耀而死！”两人双手一握，奔赴战场。
  机关枪的子弹般砸向我方，不过这似乎对训练有素的十字军没影响。
  “火箭炮准备，开火！”只见那一发火箭弹穿过激光盾在敌堆里炸开了花。年轻人背后的火箭锤使其将十几名钢铁撞飞，紧接着拿住一名钢铁战士的头在地上疯狂摩擦，最后，一把扔于天际：“哈哈，我爱这风里的味道。”老者跟了上来"回去保护你的队友，莱因哈特！"可他却不以为然：“啊，他们只会拖后腿！”随后有跑了出去，“放心，他们没事！”只见战场的另一边。
  “莱因哈特在哪！”一位士兵大喊道。
  这时天上出现了一个盒子，比其他的都大，随之诞生的是一位平方一样高的巨型机器人。
  “那个，归我了！”很显然莱因哈特盯上了它，背后的反应堆燃起熊熊烈火，开足马力撞了上去，可意外却发生了：那重达八吨的推力竟之使其退后了一步，而且像呼吸一样简单。所有人都吓傻了，莱因哈特也不例外，愣了两三秒。而战场不是游戏，机器人抓住了这两三秒，抓住他，一刀干废了他一只眼睛，就在下死手的那么一瞬间，老者冲了过来，一锤干废一只手，可没想到它头上安了个机枪，开盾阻挡使他错过了攻击的最好时机，可幸运女神却没站在他这边，盾的能量用完了，被一刀插入了他的腰中，老者一把抓住敌人，一锤送敌人归西了。蓝色的血液大滴大滴的从腰间流出，粘在盔甲上。看着受伤的老者，莱因哈特还是一脸傲气：“我能搞定的。”
  “看得出来”回答道
  为了保护队友，二人引开了机器群，躲进了一个古堡中，并用木板挡住了门。
  “大门撑不了多久。”
  “回去集合。”老者不再嬉笑，“我来拖住他们。”
  “然后所有功劳都归你？哈哈哈！我们一定能杀回去的，一起上！”
  “啪”老者把锤子放在地上，摘下了头盔。
  “不，我要留在这。”
  看着一脸严肃的老者，他知道这不是开玩笑：“什么？我，没有你……”
  “士兵！你发过誓要效忠十字军的，履行誓言吧!他伸出了左手。
  “我……”大门再次被撞击，眼看就要撑不住了,"我不走！"
  “队友们需要你，成为他们的护盾！”此时老者恢复了平静，死一般的平静。
  “他沉默了一会，也伸出了左手，张开手掌，那个标志出现在了他的掌心。”
  “莱因哈特，为荣誉而生……”
  只见莱因哈特递出了自己的战锤：“为荣耀而死，老朋友……”转过身离去了，老者一脸满足。
  大门被撞开了老者戴上了头盔，开始战斗，火箭锤发出了史无前例的光芒！
  两位战士倒在了地上，就在子弹将要取其性命之时，一个身影破墙而出，保护着大家。随着战争的结束，众人才明白，那是莱因哈特。老者也在生命的最后一刻绽放了自己的光彩，倒在了两只雄鹰中间。
  思绪慢慢拉回现实，那一块生锈的标志被放在了老者尸体一旁：“我受到了召唤，我必须回应，一如既往。”

感觉游戏不如...ow1

Insanely good hero shooter. Practically invented the genre in the modern day and was so successful that it's clear that others have taken inspiration from it. 

The change to 5v5 was a good one. Previously in Overwatch 1, matches could stall due to tanks having very insane self-synergy, healers being completely protected by the tanks, and the dps being practically useless. The change to 5v5 leads to much faster and more aggressive games, and the balance between all 3 roles is at a really really good point right now, though healers are a bit strong compared to the other roles.

A lot of the negative reviews come from people who view any form of monetization as a bad thing. Overwatch 2 lets you buy almost any skin, emote, highlight intro, spray or voiceline for free from the credits you get from the battle pass.

Unfortunately, the premium battle pass doesn't give you enough credits to purchase the next one, and I find the value of the battle pass pretty low compared to ones in other games, but the point is: the premium battle pass isn't necessary, you never have to spend money on the game if you don't want to, and the monetization is incredibly background.

Gameplay is fun, matchmaking is fairly decent, every hero is viable, and the game rewards both good mechanical aim or good positioning and gamesense -- it's not a game that requires you to hit your headshots 100% of the time in order to be good at it.

Does not deserve the negativity.
不经历冲突,怎能不断进化

Habe das Spiel 2016 in der Beta und zum release gespielt (PS4).
Ein halbes Jahr immer wieder und danach nur noch für die Halloween Events installiert.

Dinge die jetzt neu sind: Es gibt Charms und Souvenirs, außerdem kann man sich jetzt die Helden die eigentlich teil des Standard Spiels waren mit Echtgeld kaufen (keine Ahnung was das für neue Spieler bedeutet, ich hatte schon alle Helden, außer den neusten 3) und nicht zu vergessen die 5 Minuten PVE Missionen die man jetzt für 15€ kaufen muss anstatt wie damals angekündigt 30€ fürs OW2 Story/PVE Game.

Das Spiel läuft absolut flüssig auf Ultra Settings mit ner RTX 3060 (war Standard, hab nix geändert) also deutliche Verbesserung zu früher. Hilft nur leider nichts wenn die Firma dahinter auf EA macht und nur noch versucht so viel Geld wie möglich aus den Spielern zu saugen. 

3/10

暴雪你妈妈死了，为了赚钱做了个2。ow1不赚钱大家都知道，你出2大家也都支持，但是你看看做成了个啥样？一坨大便！你出通行证咋们不反对，但你好歹通行证里放多点币吧，apex不会学吗？人家通行证打满都能续杯照样有钱赚。你皮肤收钱咋们也不反对，但你这个吃相要不要太难看了一点？
更别说游戏质量了，ow2发售的时候是个半成品有目共睹。本来就糟糕的平衡组平衡了几年终于搞的差不多的一代平衡，到了二代删了一个T又能大改。然后删了一个T嘛原来那些副T定位的有几个直接下水道，路霸现在削弱到一坨屎(挫败感.jpg)，球彻底成了孤儿选手只能放狗，请问设计师有没有想过没了双T联动T位该怎么改？新英雄强度方面也是一坨大便。先是女王这个owl非Ban必选出了以后使劲削，然后是索杰恩这个刮痧到超模再到刮痧，然后是拉玛刹这个大便。从头到尾看下来出来以后强度合格人气不错的也就一个雾子，顺带给3D区涨了不少流量。
再提提那些越改越拉的UI和系统。UI跟一代一比简洁是简洁了但是丑的一逼，我女朋友跟我一样一代老玩家看到这个UI当场气的退坑表示做的跟个半成品一样。还有说好的武器检视呢？一代的火力全开呢？火烧到你考迪克祖坟上了去吧！
更别提说好的PVE，一开始说的挺好延期一点大家也接受，然后表示技能树砍了，又要放出来捞一笔？我去你妈的吧，就你这态度必不可能买的。
还有我tm原价买了国服的ow1，打折买了外服的ow1，所以这个傻逼ow2我根本不是免费获得的，绝对不可能打上免费获得产品的勾，你把国服还给我也不可能。
总结：艹你妈的暴雪，艹你妈的考迪克。希望来个勇士真的烤了你的迪克!
Fuck you Blizzard! Fuck you Boby Kotick!

I have 800 hours into this game before it launched on steam today, When Overwatch 2 was announced they promised everyone that preordered the game that OW2 was being purchased as a standalone PVE game that also included the original Overwatch PVP experience, I preordered the game and paid $120 for the preorder because I was excited to finally get to check out all the crazy shit they were telling us we could have in the PVE mode, and then the game launched with none of the promised features. This game launched with no PVE content, literally Zero Anti cheat system, and a Ranked competitive system that is so hilariously awful that it makes being kicked in the nuts sound more enjoyable. For example they never reset anyones rankings from the first game, they just left it all in no clean start for anyone. When the new games season 1 started OW2 ranked placed bronze 5 players against Top 500 pro players and provided the single most one-sided games in existence, Blizzard "fixed" this they claimed but all they did was make it so that bronze silver and gold players still mingled and that the top 500 players can group with bronze players in order to literally boost those players for money in games. After all this idiocy, Season 2 hits and anyone who went from bronze 5 to Gold or Platinum through sheer ignorant willpower in Season 1 found their ranks completely reset and themselves being put back to Bronze 5. Why? you may ask yourself would this happen? Because you didn't play all 3 class roles, and get tham all to platinum. Blizzard sets your rank for the season to whatever the lowest rated role you have is there is zero point in playing this game as a single role because you are literally punished for it. They also remove your ranking completely if you do not play ranked for an entire season. They fully reset you to the lowest SR level you can get, this game is completely designed around keeping you playing it in a sick attempt at draining your wallet for zero reward every 60 days. Fastforward 8 months And FINALLY the PVE content is being released (months after they announced they canceled the original PVE content we were promised) And anyone who Pre-ordered the game for the PVE is now being told they have to pay $15 to access the content they should be given for free.

Do not pay for this game, if you want to spend money on a game Reinstall TF2 and buy hats, install Smite or Paladins pay for their content the games are fun and don't fuck you over like Blizzard is fucking you over with Overwatch 2.

连上又断

I bought this game many years ago. Honestly, after so much that they promised and didn't deliver, they disappointed me and a large part of their community. Going to free to play mode can be understood, but the prices are a mockery in addition to the content offered, either through the pass or in its rotating store. Their competitive system doesn't work well in terms of matchmaking most of the time. And besides many other things that are annoying.

I would recommend the game perhaps, but honestly not with the paid content it offers or the promises it makes for its community.

Play it only if you want to spend some time to distract yourself and without spending money, it really isn't worth it.
쓰레기 게임

Overwatch was such an amazing game, definitely on the path to becoming an all-time classic.
They killed it to release the first ever sequel that does nothing but actively remove features from the game.

Incredibly predatory monetization that fundamentally goes against some of the core design concepts of the game (counterpicking).

The single promised feature with any relevance cancelled, because it wouldn't have made enough money.

The competitive ranking system made completely unrewarding.

I applaud the people responsible for their ability to completely suck the soul out of a game that originally had so much of it. They genuinely succeeded in making the game completely unenjoyable to play.
